MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the L6  postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Parton Street, Prescot Road and surrounding streets. It  was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11PM to remove the generator and finalise repairs to the underground cable network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:15PM on 1st February 2021
